FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Rolodink

why.question: Why Rolodink? Aren't there enough CRM systems?
why.answer: Rolodink is specifically designed for LinkedIn and focuses on personal notes instead of complex CRM functions.

free.question: Is Rolodink really free?
free.answer: Yes, Rolodink is completely free to use as a Chrome extension. No credit card required, no limits.

security.question: How secure are my notes?
security.answer: Your notes are securely stored with encryption and are only visible to you. We use end-to-end encryption and comply with GDPR guidelines.

mobile.question: Does Rolodink work on mobile?
mobile.answer: Currently, Rolodink is available as a Chrome extension. A mobile version is in development.

export.question: Can I export my notes?
export.answer: Yes, you can export all your notes to various formats for backup and transfer.

visibility.question: Do others see my notes on LinkedIn?
visibility.answer: No, your notes are completely private and only visible to you.

legal.question: Does Rolodink comply with privacy laws?
legal.answer: Yes, Rolodink complies with GDPR and all relevant privacy legislation. Your data is never shared with third parties.

support.question: What about updates and support?
support.answer: Rolodink is regularly updated with new features and security patches. Support is available via our Help Center.
